instruction: Who can benefit from meditation and why?
output: Anyone can benefit from meditation, as it offers a range of physical, mental and emotional health benefits. Physically, it can reduce tension and pain, increase energy levels, and help improve concentration. Mentally, it can help reduce anxiety and stress, improve memory and clarity of thought, and increase self-awareness. Emotionally, it can lead to a more positive outlook, increased self-esteem and psychological resilience. In short, meditation can help to bring balance and harmony to a person's life.
